description: A history of theatrical film production in Australia including brief extracts from features illustrating development from the 19th Century to the postwar period. The problems of distribution of Australian films are explored, and well known film industry figures Ken G. Hall and Mrs. Elsa Chauvel discuss difficulties encountered.
